name: Fonts & Layouts [5 Free Layouts]
description:
Bunch of web layout templates with different font combinations ― Discover some of greatest free fonts and get inspired for your next project.


Fonts & Layouts is collection web layout templates inspired by amazing free fonts. In this collection you will find 50 layouts and 70 fonts with link where you can download it.


Get al 50 layouts on Gumroad


Update: Added "Layout 48" to "5 Free Layouts"
